mapper.update: update IQ_METADATA set DEL_FLG = '1' where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into IQ_METADATA (PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update IQ_METADATA set DS_ID = #{dsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_NAME = #{tbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME from IQ_METADATA where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME from IQ_METADATA where DEL_FLG = '0'

select md.PK_ID, md.DS_ID, md.NAME, md.DESCRIPTION, md.NOTE, md.DEL_FLG, md.CRT_USER, md.CRT_TIME, md.UPT_USER, md.UPT_TIME, md.TB_NAME, ds.NAME as DS_NAME, ds.TYPE as DS_TYPE, ds.DESCRIPTION as DS_DESC from IQ_METADATA md left join COM_DATASOURCE ds on md.DS_ID = ds.PK_ID and ds.DEL_FLG = '0' where md.DEL_FLG = '0' and md.PK_ID = #{pkId} and md.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and md.DESCRIPTION like '%'||#{describe}||'%' and md.NOTE like '%'||#{note}||'%' and md.DS_ID = #{dsId} and md.CRT_TIME >= #{crtTimeStart} and #{crtTimeEnd} >= md.CRT_TIME and md.UPT_TIME >= #{uptTimeStart} and #{uptTimeEnd} >= md.UPT_TIME and md.CRT_USER like '%'||#{crtUser}||'%' and md.UPT_USER like '%'||#{uptUser}||'%' and md.TB_NAME = #{tbName} order by md.NAME asc
select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME from IQ_METADATA where DEL_FLG = '0' and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME from IQ_METADATA where DEL_FLG = '0' and DS_ID = #{dsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
